external_games.name: World of Tanks - Ambush From Afar

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ambush From Afar
summary:
When you command the SU-130PM, you command a vehicle built to unleash hell and relocate before the enemy even knows what hit 'em!

Get this punishing World War II tank destroyer in the Ambush From Afar bundle. It comes with the customizable Klimov 3D Commander and 14 days of Premium Time to increase your earnings in every battle.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier VIII SU-130PM Tank Destroyer
- Klimov 3D Premium Commander
- Premium Time - 14 Days

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo. Premium Commanders start with two open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +15% bonus rate.
